item.title: Passenger Address System (Courier/ Supernumerary Address System) – Direct Access Function

numlitem.para: Alternate, normal and emergency procedures and/or operating restrictions are established and used, and
Handset 4P function at affected station is operative.
The Captain or his designee will verbally advise the upper deck occupants of normal and emergency procedures.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s Audio Selector panel "DIRECT ACCESS FUNCTION INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
